description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Love decorating Christmas Trees? Decorate to your heart's content with Christmas Tree! With over 100 decorations to choose from you can decorate your tree however you like. Control the wind with your cursor and watch the ornaments sway and chime to the breeze. Makes for a great interactive holiday display, including Christmas music from Kevin MacLeod to help set the mood. Happy Holidays!
